title: Experiencing the Heavenly Realms Expanded Edition: Keys to Accessing Supernatural Encounters
features: You Can Experience the Heavenly Places...Now!
What does it mean to be
seated with Christ in heavenly places
? Many Christians are familiar with this Biblical language but does it have practical, everyday meaning? Is it possible to experience the heavenly realms
In this newly expanded edition of

, Judy Franklin leads you on a step-by-step journey borne out of her own supernatural experiences. Judy will show you how to Biblically encounter the heavenly realm and its life-changing joy, intimacy with God, healing and wholeness just like she did!
Activate your capacity to see into the supernatural.
Activate your capacity to see into the supernatural.
Experience a love in the third heaven realm like you have never known before.
Experience a love in the third heaven realm like you have never known before.
Be touched and healed by the Lord: emotionally, mentally and physically.
Be touched and healed by the Lord: emotionally, mentally and physically.
Go from knowing about Jesus to knowing Him on an experiential level.
Go from knowing about Jesus to knowing Him on an experiential level.
If you hunger for a deeper, more experiential relationship with God, the visions, testimonies and supernatural stories you read about will help usher you into a lifestyle of divine encounters!
description: Judy Franklin works for Bill Johnson of Bethel Church in Redding, CA. Her supernatural experiences have made her a bridge for many to encounter God and connect with the invisible realm. She has a heart for showing others how to enjoy an intimate relationship with Father God in a practical, Biblical and experiential manner. She has three children, seven grandchildren and one great-grandchild.

Beni Johnson and her husband, Bill Johnson are the Senior Leaders of Bethel Church. Together they serve a growing number of churches that have partnered for revival. Beni oversees Bethel’s intercessors and Prayer House. She has a passion to see joyful intercession restored in the church and divine health become a lifestyle among the body of Christ. Bill and Beni have 3 children and their spouses. They also have nine grandchildren.

Beni, along with her husband, Bill Johnson, was the senior pastor of Bethel Church. Beni had a call to intercession that remains an integral part of the Bethel Church mission. She was pivotal in the development of Bethel's Prayer House as well as the intercession team. Beni carried a call to see the church become healthy and whole in their bodies, souls, and spirits. Her passion for people, health, and intercession has all helped to bring the much-needed breakthrough in Bethel's ministry. Beni’s vision was to see the people of God be filled with joyful prayer, intercession, and complete wellness.
